acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill in POJOs with attributes containing wildcards
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldFillInPojosWithAttributesContainingWildcards

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ReadOnlyWildcardFieldsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type class java.lang.Object
Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type class java.lang.Object and value of type class java.lang.Object
